title: Spacious 880 SF 15th FL Corner 1 BD/1BA + OFFICE - UTILITIES INCLUDED!
posting_body: ['666 Post Street #1503: 880 SF One Bedroom Corner Apartment in Lower Nob Hill', 'Please watch YouTube video of apartment below before inquiring:', '<URL>', 'Note- unit can be delivered lightly furnished or unfurnished', 'DESCRIPTION:', "Spacious (880 sf) one bedroom on the corner of 15th Floor of the Crown Tower Building, a well-managed historic 1920's art deco Co-Op building two blocks from Union Square", 'Apartment has a great deal of charm and character and features many elegant period details such as crown molding, hardwood floors, high ceilings, arched doorways, built-in shelving, fireplace with mantle, and chandeliers', 'On the 15th floor with southern and western exposure apartment gets abundant natural light and has a light, airy feel.', 'Expansive windows throughout offer stunning, sweeping city views in multiple directions (spectacular at night and wonderful for entertaining)', 'Spacious corner living room features fireplace and additional small office room (with window) that would be perfect for an office', 'Master bedroom has amazing views, large walk in closet, and small en suite working basin/vanity', 'Kitchen features electric range, microwave, small dishwasher, new fridge/freezer, abundant cabinet space, and large eat-in area perfect for dining area with views', 'Original tiled bathroom with entrance from two sides features a separate oversize tub/shower and separate shower stall', 'Additional amenities include: shared indoor/outdoor solarium/roof-deck, bike storage, lobby attendant, and large card operated laundry room on-site', 'No parking directly in building, but monthly parking available at garage 2 blocks away (at Post and Mason) for $300/month', 'LOCATION:', 'Located on a quaint street only two blocks from Union Square with many fashionable retail stores, fine dining options, and nightlife', 'Twelve minute walk to Trader Joe’s grocery store', 'Walk Score of “99 – Walker’s Paradise” and Transit Score of 100, “Rider’s paradise;” Ten minute walk to BART and multiple muni lines', 'OTHER DETAILS:', 'No smoking', 'Owner pays for water, garbage, gas & electricity (tenant pays for internet - fiber access available)', 'Sorry, no pets', 'Building/co-op charges a move-in/move-out fee', 'Minimum lease term is 12 months', 'Can be rented partially furnished or unfurnished', 'Deposit is 1.5x monthly rent', 'For more information', 'Contact Lisa at', 'show contact info', 'Compass', 'Lic#02094548']
